idef0.viewpoint: of the analyst who is responsible for performing a structural analysis of a composite structural part product. The analyst may transfer shape (geometric and topological), and material (composite and metallic) constituent and representation information from the design function to aid in the creation of analysis models, and may transfer this information back to the design function to provide recommended changes

activity.name: Design and Analyze a Product
activity.description: The complete design and analysis life cycle from the pre-proposal phase to product support in the field.

activity.name: Design and Analyze a Product
activity.description: The complete design and analysis life cycle from the pre-proposal phase to product support in the field.

activity.name: Conduct Detail Product Analyses
activity.description: The complete design and analysis life cycle from the pre-proposal phase to product support in the field.

icom.name: Design History
icom.description: The design history consists of all the similar design activities that have created data that is similar to the part.

icom.name: Procured Products and Information
icom.description: The as-built products and information as purchased from the outside associate or subcontractors. It includes not only the procured products, but the respective drawings, material information such as stock, material properties, etc.

icom.name: Product Development Standards
icom.description: The quality and product standards for preparation and presentation of the product.

icom.name: Product Development and Maintenance Techniques
icom.description: The development and maintenance techniques of the product.

icom.name: Used Product
icom.description: The product as a result of use in the field.

icom.name: Staff and Tools
icom.description: The staff and tools from the contractor, the customer and materials supplier.

icom.name: Product Interface
icom.description: All the structural interfaces that mate with the product.

icom.name: Field and Maintenance Changes and Revision History
icom.description: The reviewed field/maintenance changes that result from field use of the structural part and the history of these changes in the field.

icom.name: Product Prelim Design System Description
icom.description: The product preliminary design system description contains the system relationships of a preliminary product.

icom.name: Product Design History
icom.description: The design history of the product.

icom.name: Design Requirement Changes
icom.description: Changes in requirements that result in changes to the design of the product.

icom.name: Product Material Changes
icom.description: Changes to the materials used to create the product.

icom.name: Preliminary Design Requirements Changes
icom.description: The preliminary design requirements changes based on the analysis, producibility and maintainability results.

icom.name: Product Producibility and Logistics Data and Build Changes
icom.description: The preliminary design requirements changes based on the logistics, producibility and build results.

icom.name: Product Prototypes
icom.description: The prototypes of the product.

icom.name: Detailed Description Requirements Changes
icom.description: The detail design requirements changes based on the analysis, producibility and maintainability results.

icom.name: Field Maintenance Changes
icom.description: The reviewed field/maintenance changes that result from field use of the product.

icom.name: Preliminary Function Requirements
icom.description: The preliminary functional product requirements.

icom.name: Product Producibility and Logistics Data
icom.description: The product producibility and logistics data is derived from the various manufacturing, maintainability and field product support studies done for the product.

icom.name: Product Build Changes
icom.description: Product build changes are those that are occurring during the production process of the product.

icom.name: Product Test Data
icom.description: All of the test data from the structural verification test of the product and its subcomponents.

icom.name: Approved Product Requirements
icom.description: The functional and cross-functional requirements that have been reviewed to be specific to a product. They include the technical performance constraints of the various functions along with the envelope features that are desired. The pertinent functions are from the manage, design, build, and support activities.

icom.name: Pre-Release Product Preliminary Design
icom.description: The pre-released product preliminary design and analysis data.

icom.name: Selected Product Preliminary Design
icom.description: The structural product design selected from the various concepts that were traded, is now ready for the detail design phase.

icom.name: Approved Product Data
icom.description: The functional and cross-functional approved product data that have been reviewed to be specific to a product. They include the technical performance constraints of the various functions along with the envelope features that are desired. The pertinent functions are from the manage, design, build and support activities.

icom.name: Preliminary Product Test Requirements
icom.description: The preliminary product test requirements based on the preliminary design and analysis of the product.

icom.name: Detailed Product Test Requirements
icom.description: The detail product test requirements based on the preliminary detail and analysis of the product.

icom.name: Pre-release Product Detail Data
icom.description: The pre-released detail product design data consists of all the models, drawings and parts list that make up the product.

icom.name: Pre-release Product Design Data
icom.description: The pre-released production support design and analysis data of the product.

icom.name: Tested Product Prototypes
icom.description: The tested product prototypes consist of all the pre-production physical or electronic models of the product that have been tested.

icom.name: Product Design Data
icom.description: Product design data consists of all the configuration managed design and analysis information that occurs for preliminary, detail and production support phases of the product.

icom.name: Product Properties
icom.description: Xxxx

icom.name: Product Preliminary Design
icom.description: Xxxx

icom.name: Product Property Allowables
icom.description: XXXXX

icom.name: Product Property Data
icom.description: xxx

icom.name: Recommended Design Changes
icom.description: Sxx

icom.name: Durability and Damage Tolerance Changes
icom.description: The detail part analysis dealing with durability of the product and the damage tolerance of the product.

icom.name: Product Detail Design Data
icom.description: The detail product design data consists of all the models, drawings and parts list that make up the product.

icom.name: Detail Design Requirement Changes
icom.description: The detail design requirements changes based on the analysis, producibility and maintainability results.

icom.name: Detail Analysis Output
icom.description: All analysis output data from finite element, detail, and durability/damage tolerance analyses, and the documentation of the decisions taken during those analyses

icom.name: Detail Design Test Requirements
icom.description: The detail product test requirements based on the preliminary detail and analysis of the product.

icom.name: Detailed Product Preliminary Design
icom.description: xx

icom.name: Product Producibility and Test Data
icom.description: xx

icom.name: Collected Product Baseline Data
icom.description: The collected product baseline data consists of the required input geometry, system, and drawing data.

icom.name: Product Development Standards
icom.description: The quality and product standards for preparation and presentation of the product.

icom.name: Product Node and Drawing Tree
icom.description: The product model and drawing tree consist of a hierarchical relationship of the drawings and models of the product.

icom.name: Product Review Data
icom.description: Product review data is that which has been done in the in-house and customer reviews of the design of the product.

icom.name: Product Models and Drawings
icom.description: The product models and drawings are all the geometric and associated engineering notes for the products.

icom.name: Product Analysis Constraints
icom.description: The detail analysis done on the product has determined strength limits for the product.

icom.name: Product Parts List
icom.description: Product parts list consist of all the material and subcomponents that make up the product.

icom.name: Detailed Product Design Data
icom.description: The detailed product design data consists of all the models, drawings and parts list that make up the product.

icom.name: Durability and Damage Tolerance Allowables
icom.description: The detail product analysis is dealing with durability of the structural part and the damage tolerance of the product.
